DOC.brief_summary: Register study . Patients operate right-sided colon tumor benign adenoid year 2011 2012 . The study compare open surgery laparoscopic surgery ERAS ( Enhanced Recovery After Surgery ) protocol . Hypothesis : Operation right-sided colon tumor large benign adenoid , good selection patient open laparoscopic surgery improve short term result .
DOC.brief_title: Right-sided Colon Tumor , Laparoscopic Versus Open Surgery , ERAS Protocol
DOC.criteria: rightsided colon tumor large benign adenoid
